title: Music for Advertising & Film Catalog
description: Music for Advertising & Film hits some of the most sought after & popular music marketing genres like: Indie Rock, Electro Pop, Hipster Folk, Southern Country, Alternative Rock as well as other trending modern genres in film & advertising.
longDescription:
Audio Demo

This music library is sure to become a go-to music catalog for you to pull from when looking for high production value at a low cost. It’s a heavy-hitting pack, weighing in at almost 3GB & features over 4.5 hours of composed music. Each track is around 3-5 minutes long giving you enough room to adjust the track to your liking. Now it’s easier than ever to sound great and make your projects stand out, while not breaking the bank. In the future, you will be happy to have Music for Advertising & Film. Just browse, preview, and then publish your film, or movie using this custom stockpile of rocking cool modern music.


Everything is organized into genre-specific folders & each track meticulously file-named & tagged with form, key, genre, & BPM. We’ve also added Soundminer metadata into the samples to help you find the find right track at the right time. All files are mixed and mastered to give you production-ready music, out of the box. No further action needed. Find good music all in one spot with Music for Advertising & Film. All files are Royalty-Free and supplied to you in high-quality 44.1k/16bit .WAV file format. A must-have and indispensable for setting the right emotion, feel, & tone in your next film, game, or commercial audio project. See for yourself and listen through the demos!
technicalDetails:
Product details:

  • 77 unique full-length soundtracks
  • 2.97 GB of samples
  • Over 4.5 hours of high-quality production music
  • All in 44.1k/16bit .wav file format
  • 11 alternative rock tracks
  • 31 folk & country acoustic tracks
  • 10 piano-based tracks
  • 6 pop-rock vibe tracks
  • 19 indie & electro pop-rock tracks
  • Includes Soundminer metadata
  • Great Value & Top-Notch Quality
  • Perfect for Film, TV, Adverts, Videos, Weddings
  • RTU-OTB


Number of Audio Wavs: 77

Number of Audio Cues: 77

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1k/16bit

Does music loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 4 hours & 43 min

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
